thread.title: Darren Coles
thread.title_full: Retail Merchant Services reviewed by Darren Coles

author: Darren Coles
title: Darren Coles
text: Mike Thackery was excellent. He set us up In no time at all! He called when he said he would and was very efficient thoughout. Unbelievable customer service skills and I would recommend the company to other businesses. I have had several sales people in the past offer us card machines and they were all awful hence we never got set up. Credit to Mike for doing everything he said he would do. Thank you
